channel.title: Client Help please
channel.description:
Hey i was just wondering how to edit the client im using so instead of just having the name and password on the login page i can have name, password, IP and port.
Or even if you could just tell me how to change the default IP would help ty

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Open client.java and do the rest yourself.
